settings.script: if (params.avc3 == null) { return null }  else if (params.M8020C6 == 0) { return 0 } else { return 100*(params.M8020C3/params.M8020C6) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Avail_M8020C3:*

panels.title: Cell Availability

panels.description: Displays the number of cells up in the selected network

settings.script: doc['pm_data.LTE_Cell_Avail_M8020C3'].size()

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND -pm_data.LTE_Cell_Avail_M8020C3:0

panels.title: Cells UP

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C23:*
pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C22:*

panels.title: Average and Max PDCP datarate UL

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C26:*
pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C25:*

panels.title: Average and Max PDCP datarate DL

panels.description: The measurement gives indication of the eUu interface traffic load by reporting Mean UL PDCP traffic throughput.

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C23:*

panels.title: Total PCDP Datarate UL

settings.script: if (params.av_58 == null) { return null } else { return params.C58 }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_UE_Quantity_M8051C58:*

panels.title: Active UE quantity

panels.description: Displays the number of cells locked in the selected network

settings.script: doc['pm_data.LTE_Cell_Avail_M8020C3'].size()

targets.query: (pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL*) AND (pm_data.LTE_Cell_Avail_M8020C3:0 OR pm_data.LTE_Cell_Avail_M8020C6:0)

panels.title: Cells Locked

panels.description: The measurement gives indication of the eUu interface traffic load by reporting Mean DL PDCP traffic throughput.

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C26:*

panels.title: Total PCDP Datarate DL

panels.description: This KPI shows the ratio of services in a cell being available for end users.

settings.script: if (params.avc3 == null) { return null }  else if (params.M8020C6 == 0) { return 0 } else { return 100*(params.M8020C3/params.M8020C6) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Avail_M8020C3:*

panels.title: LTE_5750a E-UTRAN Cell Availability Ratio

panels.description: E-UTRAN LTE_UE_Quantity_M8051C58

settings.script: if (params.av_58 == null) { return null } else { return params.C58 }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_UE_Quantity_M8051C58:*

panels.title: M8051C58 - E-UTRAN LTE_UE_Quantity

panels.description: E-UTRAN Average Latency Downlink [ms]

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Load_M8001C2:*

panels.title: LTE_5134a	E-UTRAN Average Latency Downlink [ms]

panels.description: The KPI shows the number of attempts for the elementary procedure "RRC connection establishment" used to set up a radio connection from UE to eNB (involves SRB1 establishment).

settings.script: if (params.AV_C17 == null) { return null } else { return (params.M8013C17 + params.M8013C18 +params.M8013C19 +params.M8013C34 +params.M8013C31 +params.M8013C21 +params.M8013C93 +params.M8013C91) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_UE_State_M8013C17:*

panels.title: LTE_6160b Total E-UTRAN RRC Connection Setup Attempts

panels.description: The KPI indicates the number of E-RAB setup attempts.

settings.script: if (params.av_6c0 == null) { return null } else { return params.c0 }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_EPS_Bearer_M8006C0:*

panels.title: LTE_5118a E-UTRAN E-RAB Setup Attempts

panels.description: The KPI shows the setup success ratio for the RRC connection re-establishment procedure. The procedure is used in case of a failure situation (such as a radio or handover failure) to keep the UE in an LTE RRC_CONNECTED state and continue the RRC connection without going to an RRC_IDLE state.

settings.script: if (params.av_c5 == null) { return null } else if (params.c4 == 0){ return 0 } else { return 100*(params.c5/params.c4) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_RRC_M8008C5:*

panels.title: LTE_5143a Total E-UTRAN RRC Connection Re-establishment Success Ratio

panels.description: The KPI shows the Data Radio Bearer Setup Attempts.

settings.script: if (params.av_c0 == null) { return null } else { return params.c0 }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Radio_Bearer_M8007C0:*

panels.title: LTE_5116a E-UTRAN Data Radio Bearer Attempts

panels.description: This KPI shows the average number of UEs having one SRB during the measurement period.

settings.script: if (params.AV_60 == null) { return null }  else if (params.M8051C61 == 0) { return 0 } else { return (params.M8051C60/params.M8051C61) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_UE_Quantity_M8051C61:*

panels.title: LTE 5242b E-Utran Average RRC Connected UEs

panels.description: This KPI shows the PDCP SDU volume on an eUu interface per cell in a downlink direction.

settings.script: if (params.AV_C20 == null) { return null }  else { return (params.M8012C20/1000000) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C20:*

settings.script: if (params.AV_C20 == null) { return null }  else { return (params.M8012C20/1000000) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C20:*

panels.title: LTE 5212a E-Utran PDCP SDU Volume DL

panels.description: This KPI shows the PDCP SDU volume on an eUu interface per cell in an uplink direction.

settings.script: if (params.AV_C19 == null) { return null }  else { return (params.M8012C19/1000000) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C19:*

settings.script: if (params.AV_C19 == null) { return null }  else { return (params.M8012C19/1000000) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C19:*

panels.title: LTE 5213a E-Utran PDCP SDU Volume UL

panels.description:
The measurement gives indication of the eUu interface traffic load by reporting Mean UL PDCP traffic throughput.
This counter is updated when a PDCP SDU is received from UE.

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C23:*
pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C23:*

panels.title: Average PDCP Layer Throughput UL

panels.description:
The measurement gives indication of the eUu interface traffic load by reporting Mean DL PDCP traffic throughput.
This counter is updated when a PDCP SDU is transmitted towards the UE.

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C26:*
pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C26:*

panels.title: Average PDCP Layer Throughput DL

panels.description:
This KPI describes the total number of RA preambles.
Both contention based and dedicated preambles are considered within the KPI.

settings.script: if (params.AV_C6 == null) { return null }  else { return (params.M8001C6 + params.M8001C7 + params.M8001C286) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Load_M8001C6:*

panels.title: LTE 6159a E-Utran RACH Setup Attempts

panels.description: The KPI shows the setup success ratio for the elementary procedure "RRC connection establishment" used to set up a radio connection from UE to eNB (involves SRB1 establishment) .

settings.script: if (params.AV_C5 == null) { return null } else if ( (params.M8013C17 + params.M8013C18 +params.M8013C19 +params.M8013C34 +params.M8013C31 +params.M8013C21 +params.M8013C93 +params.M8013C91) == 0) { return 0 } else { return 100 * ((params.M8013C5)/(params.M8013C17 + params.M8013C18 +params.M8013C19 +params.M8013C34 +params.M8013C31 +params.M8013C21 +params.M8013C93 +params.M8013C91)) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_UE_State_M8013C5:*

panels.title: LTE 5218g Total E-UTRAN RRC Connection Setup Success Ratio

panels.description:
This KPI describes the ratio of abnormally released (dropped) E-RABs from RAN point of view.
Each bearer of the Bearer to be Released List IE is counted. RAN point of view means that as abnormal E-RAB drops only those ones initiated by eNB are counted.E-RAB releases due to pre-emption initiated by eNB are counted as normal releases as they are not real drops resulted from any radio quality problems. In denominator of the formula normal E-RAB releases due to successful HO to eHRPD are not counted.

settings.script: if (params.AV_C261 == null) { return null }  else if ((params.M8006C254 + params.M8006C261 + params.M8006C6 + params.M8006C7 + params.M8006C8 + params.M8006C9 + params.M8006C277 - params.M8006C301 + params.M8006C303 + params.M8006C306 + params.M8006C309 + params.M8006C310 + params.M8006C311 + params.M8006C312 + params.M8006C313) == 0) { return 0 } else { return 100*((params.M8006C261 + params.M8006C254 - params.M8006C255 - params.M8006C258 - params.M8006C341 - params.M8006C301 + params.M8006C309 + params.M8006C311 + params.M8006C313)/(params.M8006C254 + params.M8006C261 + params.M8006C6 + params.M8006C7 + params.M8006C8 + params.M8006C9 + params.M8006C277 - params.M8006C301 + params.M8006C303 + params.M8006C306 + params.M8006C309 + params.M8006C310 + params.M8006C311 + params.M8006C312 + params.M8006C313)) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_EPS_Bearer_M8006C261:*

panels.title: LTE_5025i E-UTRAN E-RAB Drop Ratio, RAN View

panels.description:
The KPI indicates the setup success ratio of the elementary E-RAB setup procedure, used to set up the E-RAB between MME and UE.
It shows the E-UTRAN's contribution to network accessibility for the end user, not the whole end-to-end service accessibility.

settings.script: if ( params.Avg_C0 == null ) { return null } else if ( params.M8006C0 == 0 ) { return 0 } else { return 100*(params.M8006C1/params.M8006C0) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_EPS_Bearer_M8006C0:*

panels.title: LTE_5017a	E-UTRAN E-RAB Setup Success Ratio

panels.description: The KPI shows the RRC Connection Re-establishment Attempts per type, e.g. total, due to "HandoverFailure", due to "otherFailure" or due to "reconfigFailure".

settings.script: if ( params.Avg_C4 == null ) { return null } else { return params.M8008C4}

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_RRC_M8008C4:*

panels.title: LTE_6161a	RRC Connection Re-establishment Attempts per type total attempts

panels.description:
This KPI shows the average value of the physical resource block (PRB) utilization per TTI in a downlink direction. The utilization is defined by the ratio of used to available PRBs per TTI.
The monitoring also includes almost blank subframes (ABSs) for the cells that are configured as macro ones in the eICIC partnership.

settings.script: if ( params.Avg_C37 == null ) { return null } else { return params.M8011C37/10 }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Resource_M8011C37:*

panels.title: LTE_5276b	E-UTRAN average PRB usage per TTI DL / E-UTRAN Avg PRB usage per TTI DL

panels.description: This KPI shows the average value of the physical resource block (PRB) utilization per TTI in an uplink direction. The utilization is defined by the ratio of used to available PRBs per TTI.

settings.script: if ( params.Avg_C24 == null ) { return null } else { return params.M8011C24/10 }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Resource_M8011C24:*

panels.title: LTE_5273b	E-UTRAN Average PRB usage per TTI UL

panels.description:
This KPI shows the average UE reported Channel
Quality Indicator (CQI) value.

settings.script: if ((params.c36 + params.c116 + params.c37 + params.c117 + params.c38 + params.c118 + params.c39 + params.c119 + params.c40 + params.c120 + params.c41 + params.c121 + params.c42 + params.c122 + params.c43 + params.c123 + params.c44 + params.c124 + params.c45 + params.c125 + params.c46 + params.c126 + params.c47 + params.c127 + params.c48 + params.c128 + params.c49 + params.c129 + params.c50 + params.c130 + params.c51 + params.c131) == 0) { return 0 } else { return (1*(params.c37 + params.c117) + 2*(params.c38 + params.c118) + 3*(params.c39 + params.c119) + 4*(params.c40 + params.c120) + 5*(params.c41 + params.c121) + 6*(params.c42 + params.c122) + 7*(params.c43 + params.c123) + 8*(params.c44 + params.c124) + 9*(params.c45 + params.c125) + 10*(params.c46 + params.c126) + 11*(params.c47 + params.c127) + 12*(params.c48 + params.c128) + 13*(params.c49 + params.c129) + 14*(params.c50 + params.c130) + 15*(params.c51 + params.c131))/(params.c36 + params.c116 + params.c37 + params.c117 + params.c38 + params.c118 + params.c39 + params.c119 + params.c40 + params.c120 + params.c41 + params.c121 + params.c42 + params.c122 + params.c43 + params.c123 + params.c44 + params.c124 + params.c45 + params.c125 + params.c46 + params.c126 + params.c47 + params.c127 + params.c48 + params.c128 + params.c49 + params.c129 + params.c50 + params.c130 + params.c51 + params.c131) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Pwr_and_Qual_DL_M8010C36:*

panels.title: LTE_5427b	E-UTRAN Average CQI

panels.description: This KPI indicates the success ratio for the inter-frequency HO when the source eNB receives information that the UE is successfully connected to the target cell within the target eNB. The KPI is defined independently of network topology (intra-eNB HO/inter-eNB HO) and of the usage of measurement gaps.

settings.script: if ( params.Avg_c2 == null ) { return null } else if ( params.M8021C0 == 0 ) { return 0 } else { return 100*(params.M8021C2/params.M8021C0) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Handover_M8021C2:*

panels.title: LTE_5114a	E-UTRAN Inter-Frequency HO Success Ratio

panels.description: This KPI indicates attempts at an intra-frequency HO when the source eNB receives information that the UE is successfully connected to the target cell. The KPI is defined independently of  network topology (intra-eNB HO/inter-eNB HO).

settings.script: if ( (params.M8009C6 + params.M8014C6 + params.M8014C18 - params.M8021C0) == 0 ) { return 0 } else { return 100*(params.M8009C7 + params.M8014C7 + params.M8014C19 - params.M8021C2)/(params.M8009C6 + params.M8014C6 +params.M8014C18 - params.M8021C0) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND (pm_data.LTE_Intra_eNB_HO_M8009C7:* OR pm_data.LTE_Inter_eNB_HO_M8014C7:* OR pm_data.LTE_Handover_M8021C2:*)

panels.title: LTE_5568a	E-UTRAN Intra-Frequency HO Success Ratio

panels.description: This KPI shows the average Received Signal Strength Indicator (RSSI) value measured in the eNB for a physical UL control channel (PUCCH) per cell and normalized per the number of PRBs applicable to PUCCH.

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Pwr_and_Qual_UL_M8005C208:*

panels.title: LTE_5368a	E-UTRAN Average RSSI per Cell for PUCCH

panels.description: This KPI shows the average Received Signal Strength Indicator (RSSI) value measured in the eNB for a physical UL shared channel (PUSCH) per cell and normalized per bandwidth (that is, a total number of PRBs).

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Pwr_and_Qual_UL_M8005C233:*

panels.title: LTE_5369a E-UTRAN Average RSSI per Cell for PUSCH

panels.description: This KPI describes attempts for the intra-frequency HO, when the source eNB receives information that the UE successfully is connected to the target cell. The KPI is defined independent of the network topology (intra eNB HO / inter eNB HO).

settings.script: params.m8009c6 + params.m8014c6 + params.m8014c18 -params.m8021c0

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias.keyword:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL*

panels.title: LTE_1093a E-UTRAN Intra-Frequency HO Att

list.description: The interval is used to aggregate the metrics over time.
list.label: Aggregation
list.name: agg
